Description:
Ease of Living with Captivating Views
Ease of Living with Captivating Views
Exceptional rural lifestyle holding of 19 ha - 47.5 acres approx with uninterrupted panoramic views to Port Philip Bay,
Mt. Eliza and the Heads.
Quality three bedroom Architect Designed home incorporating two living areas with floor-to-ceiling windows to capture the magnificent views, a superb central kitchen with double oven and dishwasher and a spacious laundry with expansive cupboards. There are built in robes in all bedrooms plus an ensuite to the main and a paved pergola off the living areas.
The 5-plus acres vineyard established in 1979 is the earliest planted on the Bellarine Peninsula and consists of drip irrigated pinot noir and chardonnay vines. Grapes have been supplied to Scotchmans Hill's premium wines for over twenty years.
Complete with in-ground solar heated swimming pool, full-size tennis court, two dams and a shed.
Just five minutes to the Bayside town of Drysdale, 15 minutes to Ocean Grove and Surf beaches. 20 minutes to Geelong and just over an hour to Melbourne.
Suitable for a wide range of agricultural pursuits.
For Sale by Expressions of Interest
Call Peter Lindeman 0418 525 609
Ian Friend 0414 581 811

Description:
Great Location with a view - 3.25 ha - 8 acres approx.
.Rural acreage complete with 3 BR brick veneer home incl: Kitchen family plus separate lounge & dining. Master with renovated ensuite. Recently painted throughout. Situated on a quiet country road on the edge of the bayside town of Drysdale. Separate 1 BR self contained bungalow. Two stables & tack room. Four paddocks. Watered by Town water, 72,000 litres rainwater & dam. 6 solar panels feed power back to the Grid. A beautifully treed and landscaped property. Take in the serenity of the quiet surrounds and enjoy expansive northerly views over Port Philip Bay to the You Yangs and valley views to Melbourne skyline. 20 minutes Geelong and just over an hour to Melbourne.
Peter Lindeman : 0418525609

Description:
Better-Than-New Modern Family Home
Boasting space and style in abundance, this sensational 3-year-old modern family home provides the best in family living, with delightful gardens and a choice of indoor/outdoor living options, all in a quiet neighbourhood with easy access to shops, schools, parks and beaches.
With top-quality fixtures and fittings throughout, the home features polished spotted-gum flooring throughout; a stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances and butler's pantry accessing the big double garage; a carpeted sunken lounge/cinema with gas log fire; and vast living, dining and rumpus/billiards areas centred upon a brilliant outdoor entertaining deck.
All four beds have ceiling fans and robes, the main zoned to the front of the house with an enormous walk-in robe and a fantastic ensuite with double shower and twin vanities. With ducted heating, air-conditioned living zones, recessed display panels in the hallway, L-shaped rear verandah and lawn and much, much more, this spectacular property offers the ultimate family home at an affordable price.
Land: 773 sq m approx.

Description:
Central Drysdale Oasis (2600m2 approx)
Located in the heart of town opposite the Bowls Club and Medical Centre, this large family home offers a unique opportunity. Comprising 4 bedrooms, a study, an upstairs studio, formal dining and lounge rooms and a separate Billiards room. The beautifully appointed blackwood kitchen comes with quality European appliances.
Internal features include: magnificent restored leadlight windows and doors, antique light fittings, a blackwood staircase leading to the attic/studio, ducted heating and vacuum system and double remote control garage.
External features include: a 9m inground pool, 2x 5000 gal water tanks, 9m x 7.5m colourbond garage suit boat and caravan. All this is set amongst a manicured low maintenance garden with expansive lawn and large central water feature.
Zoned Residential 1 at approximately 2600 m2 this is an important property offering redevelopment potential S.T.C.A.

Description:
Semi Rural Haven - Lifestyle Opportunity!
Tired of living in the busy city/suburban life? On offer here is a true sanctuary, situated on the revered Bellerine Peninsula, only minutes drive to Geelong and the surf coast. This gorgeous home, only seven years old and rich in Federation Reproduction, features 4 large bedrooms, master with WIR and Ensuite, separate study, two family living areas, separate formal dining, enormous modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, central heating, split system heating and cooling, soaring 10' ceilings, impressive verandah which encircles the house, 2 x 22,000 litre water tanks, outdoor entertaining area and 4 car garage, plus workshop with separate WC. Neatly packaged on 4140m2, this is the ideal family home.

Description:
Plenty of Room to Realise your Dream
In a prized semi-rural pocket of Drysdale where space and serenity are valued above all, this newly-released allotment of one acre (approx) provides the perfect setting for a brand-new home of real character (STCA). Set amongst quality established homes in a peaceful and private court, the potential on offer here will have potential buyers salivating.
Just a short stroll from shops and schools, yet retaining a tranquil pastoral air, this prime position is within close proximity of the Bellarine Peninsula's many wondrous attractions. Only 20 minutes from Geelong, 10 minutes from Ocean Grove and 5 from Portarlington, this rural haven offers easy access to coastal treats as well as city temptations.
With the Bellarine's fabulous beaches, vineyards and family activities at your door, the list of local attractions is virtually endless. Do not miss this incredible opportunity!
Land: 4000 sq m approx.

Description:
Modern Edwardian on Double Block (1255m2)
Located in a leafy semi rural precinct close to the town, sports grounds and the histoirc Drydale railway station.
This Delightful Edwardian Style home exudes character and charm with its high ceilings and traditional box bay windows.
Comprising 4 good sized bedrooms, two bathrooms, formal lounge and an open plan kitchen, meals and family room. Other features include polished timber flooring, period fretwork,and cornices, Smeg appliances, split system, and gas ducted heating. Outside entertaining is well catered for with extensive merbu decking, built in spa, and large inter grated Gazebo. There is a separate double garage and workshop/studio(12mx6m approx). All this set amongst a leafy mature low maintenance garden.

Description:
Beautifully Built, Supremely Spacious!
Amongst beautiful established gardens in a convenient central location, this craftsman-built brick veneer unit - the front of two - exudes space and style. Less than six years old and immaculate inside and out, this is idyllic living with the best of Bellarine just a stone's throw away.
Beyond a charming front garden and verandah, it features two spacious, carpeted bedrooms with robes, the main with walk-in robe and a pristine tiled ensuite; ducted heating, cooling and vacuum; and floating timber flooring in the entry hall and enormous open-plan living/dining/kitchen area with doors to a north-facing patio. The superb kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, glass-tiled splashbacks and granite-look bench-tops including an island bench.
With other highlights including a huge central bathroom with twin vanities, a huge laundry, abundant storage and a side driveway to the auto garage with internal and rear access, this beautifully presented home is certain to delight all who inspect it.
Insights: 1/102 Barrands Lane, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 10 other 2 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Investment with Established Olive Grove Close to Drysdale
"Bellarine Golden Olive" provides a rare prime parcel of gently undulating land with 20 acres of established olive trees and 70 acres approx cropped (by sharefarmer). Situated in the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula within close proximity to popular beaches and District Vineyards yet within 30 minutes Geelong.
Large home comprising 4 bedrooms with built in robes and ensuite to Master.15m x
7.5m shed. Property fenced into 4 paddocks, watered by Town Water and two dams and offers plenty of scope for alternative farming pursuits.
The property produced the first commercial crop of olives on the Bellarine Peninsula in 2001. This was processed by the master olive oil maker, Gianni Grigoletto who was amazed at the quality of the wonderful, robust, peppery, olive oil produced from the Manzanillo cultivar and the fruity, light, piquant flavoured Frantoio oil, which the Bellarine Peninsula is now famous for producing.

Description:
An Acre of Possibilities in a Premium Location
This enticing allotment of approximately one acre in a prized semi-rural pocket of Drysdale presents a world of possibilities for you to create your dream seaside home (STCA). Surrounded by quality established residences in a peaceful and private court, the potential on offer here will set your imagination racing.
Just a short stroll from shops and schools, yet retaining a tranquil pastoral air, this prime position is within close proximity of the Bellarine Peninsula's many wondrous attractions. Only 20 minutes from Geelong, 10 minutes from Ocean Grove and 5 from Portarlington, this rural haven offers easy access to coastal treats as well as city temptations.
With the Bellarine's fabulous beaches, vineyards and family activities at your door, the list of local attractions is virtually endless. Do not miss this incredible opportunity!
Land: 1 acre approx.

Description:
Country-Style Comforts so Close to Town!
Set amongst delightful lawns and gardens on more than one acre in an attractive semi-rural setting, this charming residence offers a country lifestyle within easy reach of town conveniences. Comprising a 4-bedroom family home plus an adjoining self-contained "granny flat" with its own entrance and carport, this versatile property will surprise and delight potential buyers.
Beautifully presented inside and out, the home features a long north-facing verandah overlooking rose gardens; a spacious carpeted living room with bay window and open fireplace; an adjoining dining area; a timber kitchen serving the meals area with gas heater and hideaway study; four carpeted bedrooms with robes, the main with an ensuite; a pristine central bathroom, and a big laundry. The granny flat features an open-plan living/dining/kitchen, a bedroom with robes and a large bathroom with laundry facilities.
With a large entertaining deck overlooking a tranquil creek setting, a double auto garage with expansive workshop, a machinery shed and much more, this truly exceptional property is sure to please all who see it.
Land: 4062 sq m approx.

Description:
A Truly Exceptional Family Home
This beautifully presented 4 bedroom home is in immaculate condition throughout and features open-plan living, 9' and cathedral ceilings, and show-stopping French Oak parquetry flooring. Concertina doors open onto generously proportioned north facing verandah, overlooking the 15m x 5m solar heated pool, and provides undercover entertaining as well as natural climate control. Stereo system with internal & external speakers.
The kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite bench-tops, s/s appliances, 6-burner stove and expansive Butler's pantry. The dining and living room feature a cosy log fire, and open to a study on one side and rumpus room on the other. The master bedroom has French doors opening to a private deck, a double WIR, and sleek en-suite.
The home is appointed with quality fittings, r/c a/c and elegant lighting throughout, and an abundance of clever storage including a large storage room and walk in space under the house. Each of the other three bedrooms feature magnificent lighting, from ornate candelabra to dazzling chandeliers and all have WIRs. There is a secure garden for children to play, and a DLUG with workshop. The low maintenance gardens are drought proofed with an enormous 70,000 litre rainwater tank.
This is a truly exceptional family home, enhanced by the warmth and beauty of natural timbers, and an abundance of natural light throughout.
Auction: 20th November at 3.00pm

Description:
Cleverly Designed with Luxury and Convenience
This welcoming and beautifully presented, 18 month old home is filled with warmth & beauty. Positioned high on the hill amongst the rural community of scenic Drysdale it has an open-plan living dining area with exposed cathedral ceilings, offering an abundance of space and light and show-stopping French Oak parquetry flooring.
Concertina doors open onto a generous north facing entertaining verandah that overlooks the 15m x 5m solar heated, in ground pool. To make entertaining easy there is a stereo system with internal & external speakers.
The stylish kitchen is a chef's dream, with granite bench-tops, stainless steel appliances, and an expansive Butler's pantry. Snuggle up next to the cosy wood fire in the living room, and be able to keep and eye on the child's play room/rumpus room.
Upon entering the master bedroom, you will be in awe of the beautiful feature wall and the French doors which open to a private deck, there is a large WIR, sleek and spacious en-suite with his and her basins and double shower.
This home has been cleverly designed with luxury and convenience in mind, with quality fittings, reverse cycle air conditioning and elegant lighting throughout. There is ample storage including a large walk in storage space under the house. Walls of windows enhance the sense of openness and allowing the light to shine through.
From ornate candelabra to dazzling chandeliers, each of the other 3 bedrooms have magnificent lighting and walk in robes. There is a lovely secure garden for children to play, a vegetable garden, a double lock up garage & an additional 2 car carport with separate workshop which has been designed to blend seamlessly with the exterior of the house, complete with sink and in-built benches. The low maintenance gardens are drought proofed with an enormous rainwater tank.
This is a truly exceptional family home, enhanced by the warmth and beauty of natural timbers, and a profusion of natural light throughout. With all the delights the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer and less than 30 minutes to Geelong and a short drive to the surf coast this sensational home is sure to sweep you off your feet.
Conjunctional Agent R T Edgar Barwon Heads 5254 1688
Peter Lindeman 0418 525 609

Description:
68 Princess Street, Drysdale
It would be great to buy a 33sq home that is complete with all of today's modcons and the only thing you have to do is add your touches to the rear yard.
Complete with 4 Bedrooms, master with WIR and massive ensuite with spa bath. Also a formal living room, study, open kitchen /meals /living adjoining a large rumpus room, central bathroom with sep. WC and alfresco area for all year round entertaining.
Featuring - Stone benches, s/s 900mm appliances, pantry and DW in the kitchen, ducted heating, evap cooling, ducted vacuum, double remote garage with internal access, side access for boat, caravan or additional cars and a 6x3.5mt workshop or shed at the rear. All of this on approx 924m2 allotment.
Everything you need but still allowing you to add your mark on this well equipped home.
Peter Julian : 0422 800 400

Description:
Idyllic Family Home in Unbeatable Location
Just eleven years old and in immaculate condition inside and out, this wonderful 3-bedroom Hamlan-built home boasts timeless appeal and could easily have been built just yesterday. In a tranquil court close to Drysdale shopping centre, schools and sports facilities, this beautiful home offers idyllic family living in an unbeatable location.
It features a north-facing verandah overlooking delightful rose gardens; a spacious main bedroom zoned to the front with walk-in robe and ensuite; a cosy formal living room; and a big, air-conditioned open-plan family living/dining area served by a terrific kitchen with walk-in pantry and island bench. Sliding doors open to a paved pergola area and lovely rear lawn and landscaped gardens.
Also featuring two roomy rear bedrooms with built-in robes, a central bathroom with separate toilet, big laundry, and a remote double garage with rear roller door, this exceptional family home is sure to delight all who view it.
Land: 816 sq m approx.

Description:
Rise above the rest
The country lane like entrance rises toward the property, the towering gum trees enhance the character of this acreage. Alighting the steps to the elevated front porch you turn around and take in the clear 180 degree view of the surrounding farmlets, the Currawongs and Magpies provide the perfect soundtrack.
The 70s ranch style home has a large L shaped lounge off the hallway, and off to one side is the first of four bedrooms all of which have built in robes. Beside the kitchen with its original fittings, is the formal dining room, the sun filters through from the south providing a bright outlook. Past the living zone and down the passageway is the dormitory style wing with the other three bedrooms, a central bathroom and laundry; a country aspect is offered from every room.
Returning to the living zone you exit to a secure and private rear yard, perfectly safe in which children can play; or they may be drawn to the original stables on the southern boundary with ample room for hay and storage.
Sloping gently from the rear, the residence is centrally positioned on the allotment and could easily be enhanced by further addition (STCA) or add your own personal touch to make this house your home. Within walking distance of the township, primary and secondary schools, this is the perfect opportunity to enter the market with plenty of room to move and enjoy.
Land 1 acre approx.
Terms 10% deposit, balance 60-90 days
Land: 1 acre approx.

Description:
A Little Gem
Set on a corner allotment this 3 bedroom home is as pretty as a picture, bordered by a painted picket fence and established garden.The entrance leads through a central hallway to the living rooms with their cathedral ceiling creating a bright and spacious ambiance. The 3 bedrooms are of good size all with BIR's. The bathroom is neat as pin and the updated kitchen is pleasant and well appointed. Living areas are heated with a gas log fire and a reverse cycle air conditioner.
